law.text: There is hereby established within the department a breast cancer screening fund. Any funds appropriated by the General Assembly for the purpose of the Breast Cancer Screening Program and any gifts or federal grants shall be deposited in the State Treasury to the credit of a trust or agency fund to be used for the purposes of KRS 214.554 and shall not lapse.
law.history: Amended 1994 Ky. Acts ch. 184, sec. 4, effective July 15, 1994. -- Created 1990 Ky. Acts ch. 318, sec. 3, effective July 1, 1990.
